about.title: about-me
description: interested in how software behaves beyond its intended use, including security research and reverse engineering.
actively learning python and c++, and exploring different aspects of software development and system design.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: open to discussions related to security research, reverse engineering, programming, and technical topics.

description: based in eastern europe, i am interested in understanding how software and systems work internally, including behavior beyond intended use.
my focus spans security research, reverse engineering, and system internals, while also studying programming languages such as python and c++.
i aim to build a deeper understanding of software development, system design, and how different components interact across different levels.

facts.title: fun-facts
list: started getting into cybersecurity after experimenting with game cheats
enjoys reading documentation only after breaking things first
learned early that trusting the client is a bad idea
